schemes.name: Ayushman Bharat (PM-JAY)
schemes.description: Provides free health insurance of up to ₹5 lakhs per family per year for secondary and tertiary care hospitalization. (Requires Aadhar and Ration Card at submission).
schemes.action_required: Aapka form taiyar hai! Kripya is form ke saath apna original Aadhar Card aur Ration Card nearest Seva Kendra par le jaayein.

schemes.name: PM Kisan Samman Nidhi
schemes.description: Income support of ₹6,000 per year given in 3 installments to all land-holding user families. (Requires Aadhar and Bank Passbook at submission).
schemes.action_required: Aapka form taiyar hai! Kripya is PDF form ke saath apna Aadhar Card aur Bank Passbook CSC center le jaayein.

schemes.name: Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana (Gramin)
schemes.description: Financial assistance to construct a pucca house for people living in kucha houses or who are homeless.
schemes.action_required: Aapka form taiyar hai! Kripya form ke saath apna Aadhar Card, Income Certificate aur Caste Certificate Seva Kendra le jaayein.

schemes.name: e-Shram Card
schemes.description: A national database for unorganized workers (construction, migrant, gig workers) providing accident insurance and social security benefits.
schemes.action_required: Aapka form taiyar hai! Kripya is form ke saath apna Aadhar Card aur Bank Passbook nearest CSC/Seva Kendra le jaayein.

schemes.name: Pre-Matric Scholarship Scheme
schemes.description: Financial aid for students from minority communities or SC/ST categories studying in class 1 to 10 to help with school fees.
schemes.action_required: Aapka form taiyar hai! Kripya iske saath apna Aadhar Card, Caste Certificate aur Income Certificate school ya Seva Kendra mein jama karein.

schemes.name: Pradhan Mantri Mudra Yojana (Shishu)
schemes.description: Provides loans up to ₹50,000 for starting small businesses (like shops, stalls) with no collateral required.
schemes.action_required: Aapka form taiyar hai! Bank jaane ke liye is form ke saath apna Aadhar Card aur PAN Card zaroor le jaayein.

schemes.name: Sukanya Samriddhi Yojana
schemes.description: A small deposit scheme for the girl child to save for her future education and marriage with high interest rates.
schemes.action_required: Aapka form taiyar hai! Kripya is form ke saath bacchi ka Birth Certificate aur mata/pita ka Aadhar Card nearest Post Office ya Bank le jaayein.

schemes.name: Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana
schemes.description: Crop insurance scheme that provides financial support to users suffering crop loss/damage arising out of unforeseen events.
schemes.action_required: Aapka form taiyar hai! Kripya is form ke saath Aadhar Card, Bank Passbook aur zameen ke kagaz (7/12 extract) Seva Kendra le jaayein.
